mil7.3.9:1.2_1: kammakāro evaṁ cintayati ‘bhatako ahaṁ imāya nāvāya kammaṁ karomi,
mil7.3.9:1.2_2: imāyāhaṁ nāvāya vāhasā bhattavetanaṁ labhāmi, na me pamādo karaṇīyo,
mil7.3.9:1.3_1: yoginā yogāvacarena evaṁ cintayitabbaṁ ‘imaṁ kho ahaṁ cātumahābhūtikaṁ kāyaṁ sammasanto satataṁ samitaṁ appamatto upaṭṭhitassati sato sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto jātijarābyādhimaraṇasokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsehi parimuccissāmīti appamādo me karaṇīyo’ti.
